# RachaAI - User Onboarding Flows
## Brazilian Cultural Adaptation & Accessibility-First Design

*Generated by Sally - UX Expert & Onboarding Specialist*
*Created: December 2024*

---

## User Onboarding Overview

This document contains comprehensive user onboarding flows for RachaAI, designed with Brazilian cultural adaptation, accessibility-first principles, and regional optimization.

---

## 1. Welcome & Regional Detection

### 1.1 Initial Welcome Screen

**Component:** `WelcomeScreen`

```typescript
interface WelcomeScreen {
  // Regional detection
  regionalDetection: {
    automatic: boolean;
    detectedRegion: 'SP' | 'RJ' | 'NE' | 'Sul' | 'auto';
    confidence: number;
    userConfirmation: boolean;
  };
  
  // Welcome message by region
  welcomeMessage: {
    SP: {
      title: "RachaAI - Divida despesas com intelig√™ncia! üç£",
      subtitle: "Rolou um rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? N√≥s resolvemos!",
      features: [
        "Reconhecimento cultural brasileiro",
        "PIX autom√°tico para pagamentos",
        "Suporte a todas as regi√µes"
      ]
    };
    RJ: {
      title: "RachaAI - Divida despesas com intelig√™ncia! üç∫",
      subtitle: "Beleza, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? N√≥s resolvemos!",
      features: [
        "Reconhecimento cultural brasileiro",
        "PIX autom√°tico para pagamentos",
        "Suporte a todas as regi√µes"
      ]
    };
    NE: {
      title: "RachaAI - Divida despesas com intelig√™ncia! üéÇ",
      subtitle: "Oxe, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? N√≥s resolvemos!",
      features: [
        "Reconhecimento cultural brasileiro",
        "PIX autom√°tico para pagamentos",
        "Suporte a todas as regi√µes"
      ]
    };
    Sul: {
      title: "RachaAI - Divida despesas com intelig√™ncia! ü•©",
      subtitle: "Bah, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? N√≥s resolvemos!",
      features: [
        "Reconhecimento cultural brasileiro",
        "PIX autom√°tico para pagamentos",
        "Suporte a todas as regi√µes"
      ]
    };
  };
  
  // Accessibility support
  accessibility: {
    screenReader: {
      announcement: "Bem-vindo ao RachaAI. Detectamos sua regi√£o automaticamente.",
      regionAnnouncement: "Regi√£o detectada: {region}. Toque para confirmar ou alterar."
    };
    keyboardNavigation: {
      tabOrder: ["region-select", "confirm-button", "skip-button"];
      shortcuts: {
        "Enter": "confirm region",
        "Space": "select region",
        "Escape": "skip onboarding"
      };
    };
    voiceInput: {
      supported: boolean;
      activation: "Diga 'confirmar regi√£o' ou 'alterar regi√£o'";
    };
  };
}
```

### 1.2 Regional Selection

**Component:** `RegionalSelection`

```typescript
interface RegionalSelection {
  // Regional options
  regions: {
    SP: {
      name: "S√£o Paulo";
      flag: "üè¢";
      expressions: ["rolou um rod√≠zio", "happy hour", "anivers√°rio meu"];
      description: "Capital financeira, express√µes paulistas";
    };
    RJ: {
      name: "Rio de Janeiro";
      flag: "üèñÔ∏è";
      expressions: ["beleza, rod√≠zio", "happy hour", "anivers√°rio"];
      description: "Cidade maravilhosa, express√µes cariocas";
    };
    NE: {
      name: "Nordeste";
      flag: "üå¥";
      expressions: ["oxe, rod√≠zio", "happy hour", "anivers√°rio"];
      description: "Terra do sol, express√µes nordestinas";
    };
    Sul: {
      name: "Sul";
      flag: "üå≤";
      expressions: ["bah, rod√≠zio", "happy hour", "anivers√°rio"];
      description: "Terra dos pampas, express√µes sulistas";
    };
  };
  
  // Selection interface
  selectionInterface: {
    type: "radio-buttons" | "dropdown" | "cards";
    defaultSelection: "auto";
    allowCustomization: boolean;
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Selecione sua regi√£o para personalizar o RachaAI";
      keyboardNavigation: "Arrow keys to navigate, Enter to select";
      voiceCommands: ["S√£o Paulo", "Rio de Janeiro", "Nordeste", "Sul"];
    };
  };
  
  // Confirmation

    message: "Regi√£o confirmada: {region}";
    screenReader: "Regi√£o {region} confirmada. Continuando para o pr√≥ximo passo.";
    hapticFeedback: "short-vibration";
  };
}
```

## 2. Accessibility Preferences

### 2.1 Accessibility Setup

**Component:** `AccessibilitySetup`

```typescript
interface AccessibilitySetup {
  // Screen reader preferences
  screenReader: {
    enabled: boolean;
    announcements: {
      culturalPatterns: boolean;
      payments: boolean;
      loading: boolean;
      errors: boolean;
    };
    voice: "VoiceOver" | "TalkBack" | "NVDA" | "other";
  };
  
  // Voice input preferences
  voiceInput: {
    enabled: boolean;
    language: "pt-BR";
    regionalAccent: "SP" | "RJ" | "NE" | "Sul";
    activationPhrase: "Ei RachaAI";
    commands: [
      "dividir despesa",
      "confirmar pagamento",
      "explicar divis√£o",
      "compartilhar PIX"
    ];
  };
  
  // Visual preferences
  visualPreferences: {
    highContrast: boolean;
    largeText: boolean;
    reducedMotion: boolean;
    colorBlindness: "none" | "protanopia" | "deuteranopia" | "tritanopia";
  };
  
  // Motor accessibility
  motorAccessibility: {
    keyboardOnly: boolean;
    voiceNavigation: boolean;
    switchControl: boolean;
    dwellTime: number; // seconds
  };
  
  // Cognitive accessibility
  cognitiveAccessibility: {
    simplifiedInterface: boolean;
    stepByStep: boolean;
    memoryAids: boolean;
    clearInstructions: boolean;
  };
  
  // Setup interface
  setupInterface: {
    type: "wizard" | "checklist" | "guided";
    progress: number; // percentage
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Configurando acessibilidade. P√°gina 1 de 3.";
      keyboardNavigation: "Tab to navigate, Space to toggle, Enter to continue";
      voiceCommands: ["ativar", "desativar", "pr√≥ximo", "anterior"];
    };
  };
}
```

### 2.2 Accessibility Testing

**Component:** `AccessibilityTesting`

```typescript
interface AccessibilityTesting {
  // Test scenarios
  testScenarios: {
    screenReader: {
      test: "Navigate through main interface";
      expected: "All elements announced clearly";
      success: "Screen reader working correctly";
      failure: "Some elements not announced";
    };
    voiceInput: {
      test: "Say 'dividir despesa'";
      expected: "Voice input activated";
      success: "Voice input working correctly";
      failure: "Voice input not responding";
    };
    keyboardNavigation: {
      test: "Navigate with Tab key";
      expected: "All elements reachable";
      success: "Keyboard navigation working";
      failure: "Some elements not reachable";
    };
    highContrast: {
      test: "Check text visibility";
      expected: "Text clearly visible";
      success: "High contrast working";
      failure: "Text difficult to read";
    };
  };
  
  // Testing interface
  testingInterface: {
    type: "interactive" | "guided" | "automatic";
    feedback: {
      visual: "success-check" | "error-x" | "warning-triangle";
      audio: "success-sound" | "error-sound" | "warning-sound";
      haptic: "success-vibration" | "error-vibration" | "warning-vibration";
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Testando acessibilidade. {test}. {result}.";
      keyboardNavigation: "Tab to next test, Enter to run test";
    };
  };
}
```

## 3. Cultural Pattern Introduction

### 3.1 Cultural Patterns Overview

**Component:** `CulturalPatternsIntro`

```typescript
interface CulturalPatternsIntro {
  // Pattern examples by region
  patterns: {
    rodizio: {
      title: "Rod√≠zio Japon√™s üç£";
      description: "Todos pagam igual, independente do que comeram";
      regionalExamples: {
        SP: "Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
        RJ: "Beleza, rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
        NE: "Oxe, rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
        Sul: "Bah, rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
      };
      calculation: "R$ 180 √∑ 4 = R$ 45 cada";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Rod√≠zio: Todos pagam igual. R$ 45 cada pessoa.";
        explanation: "No rod√≠zio, todos pagam o mesmo valor, independente do que comeram";
      };
    };
    happyHour: {
      title: "Happy Hour üç∫";
      description: "Cada um paga o que consumiu";
      regionalExamples: {
        SP: "Happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240, cada um bebeu diferente";
        RJ: "Beleza, happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240, cada um bebeu diferente";
        NE: "Oxe, happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240, cada um bebeu diferente";
        Sul: "Bah, happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240, cada um bebeu diferente";
      };
      calculation: "Jo√£o: R$ 45, Maria: R$ 35, Pedro: R$ 50...";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Happy Hour: Cada um paga o que consumiu.";
        explanation: "No happy hour, cada pessoa paga apenas o que bebeu";
      };
    };
    aniversario: {
      title: "Anivers√°rio üéÇ";
      description: "O aniversariante n√£o paga";
      regionalExamples: {
        SP: "Anivers√°rio meu, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
        RJ: "Beleza, anivers√°rio, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
        NE: "Oxe, anivers√°rio, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
        Sul: "Bah, anivers√°rio, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
      };
      calculation: "7 amigos pagam R$ 34,29 cada";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Anivers√°rio: O aniversariante n√£o paga. 7 amigos pagam R$ 34,29 cada.";
        explanation: "No anivers√°rio, o aniversariante n√£o paga, os amigos dividem a conta";
      };
    };
    churrasco: {
      title: "Churrasco ü•©";
      description: "Cada um leva algo diferente";
      regionalExamples: {
        SP: "Churrasco fam√≠lia, 10 pessoas, R$ 300";
        RJ: "Beleza, churrasco, 10 pessoas, R$ 300";
        NE: "Oxe, churrasco, 10 pessoas, R$ 300";
        Sul: "Bah, churrasco, 10 pessoas, R$ 300";
      };
      calculation: "Contribuintes recebem, n√£o contribuintes pagam R$ 30";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Churrasco: Cada um leva algo. Contribuintes recebem, outros pagam R$ 30.";
        explanation: "No churrasco, quem levou algo recebe dinheiro, quem n√£o levou paga";
      };
    };
    vaquinha: {
      title: "Vaquinha üéÅ";
      description: "Cada um contribui o mesmo valor";
      regionalExamples: {
        SP: "Vaquinha presente casamento, 20 pessoas, R$ 1000";
        RJ: "Beleza, vaquinha presente, 20 pessoas, R$ 1000";
        NE: "Oxe, vaquinha presente, 20 pessoas, R$ 1000";
        Sul: "Bah, vaquinha presente, 20 pessoas, R$ 1000";
      };
      calculation: "R$ 1000 √∑ 20 = R$ 50 cada";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Vaquinha: Cada um contribui R$ 50 para o presente.";
        explanation: "Na vaquinha, todos contribuem o mesmo valor para comprar um presente";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Interactive demonstration
  demonstration: {
    type: "interactive" | "video" | "step-by-step";
    examples: [
      "Try saying: 'Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180'",
      "Try saying: 'Happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240'",
      "Try saying: 'Anivers√°rio meu, 8 pessoas, R$ 240'"
    ];
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Demonstra√ß√£o interativa. Tente dizer uma das frases de exemplo.";
      voiceCommands: ["tentar", "pr√≥ximo exemplo", "pular demonstra√ß√£o"];
    };
  };
}
```

### 3.2 Pattern Recognition Testing

**Component:** `PatternRecognitionTest`

```typescript
interface PatternRecognitionTest {
  // Test scenarios
  testScenarios: {
    rodizio: {
      input: "Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
      expectedPattern: "rodizio";
      expectedCalculation: "R$ 45 cada";
      regionalVariation: "SP";
    };
    happyHour: {
      input: "Happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240, cada um bebeu diferente";
      expectedPattern: "happy_hour";
      expectedCalculation: "Individual payments";
      regionalVariation: "RJ";
    };
    aniversario: {
      input: "Anivers√°rio meu, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
      expectedPattern: "aniversario";
      expectedCalculation: "7 amigos pagam R$ 34,29";
      regionalVariation: "NE";
    };
  };
  
  // Testing interface
  testingInterface: {
    type: "voice" | "text" | "both";
    feedback: {
      correct: {
        visual: "‚úÖ Correct!";
        audio: "success-sound";
        haptic: "success-vibration";
        screenReader: "Correto! Padr√£o reconhecido: {pattern}";
      };
      incorrect: {
        visual: "‚ùå Try again";
        audio: "error-sound";
        haptic: "error-vibration";
        screenReader: "Tente novamente. Dica: {hint}";
      };
    };
    hints: {
      rodizio: "Mencione 'rod√≠zio' e o n√∫mero de pessoas";
      happyHour: "Mencione 'happy hour' e que cada um bebeu diferente";
      aniversario: "Mencione 'anivers√°rio' e que √© seu anivers√°rio";
    };
  };
}
```

## 4. Payment Integration Setup

### 4.1 PIX Introduction

**Component:** `PIXIntroduction`

```typescript
interface PIXIntroduction {
  // PIX explanation
  pixExplanation: {
    title: "PIX - Pagamento Instant√¢neo üí∞";
    description: "Transfer√™ncia instant√¢nea entre bancos brasileiros";
    benefits: [
      "Transfer√™ncia instant√¢nea",
      "Sem taxas",
      "Dispon√≠vel 24/7",
      "Seguro e confi√°vel"
    ];
    regionalExamples: {
      SP: "Rolou um rod√≠zio? PIX R$ 45 para Jo√£o";
      RJ: "Beleza, happy hour? PIX R$ 35 para Maria";
      NE: "Oxe, anivers√°rio? PIX R$ 34,29 para Pedro";
      Sul: "Bah, churrasco? PIX R$ 30 para Ana";
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "PIX √© o sistema de pagamento instant√¢neo brasileiro. Transfer√™ncia gratuita e segura.";
      explanation: "PIX permite transferir dinheiro instantaneamente entre contas banc√°rias";
    };
  };
  
  // PIX setup
  pixSetup: {
    required: {
      pixKey: string; // email, phone, CPF, etc.
      recipientName: string;
    };
    optional: {
      bankName: string;
      accountType: string;
    };
    security: {
      encryption: "AES-256";
      dataProtection: "LGPD compliant";
      privacy: "Data never shared";
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Configurando PIX. Digite sua chave PIX e nome do destinat√°rio.";
      keyboardNavigation: "Tab through fields, Enter to save";
      voiceCommands: ["salvar PIX", "editar PIX", "pular configura√ß√£o"];
    };
  };
}
```

```typescript
    };

    type: "simulation" | "real" | "demo";

      qrCode: boolean;
      sharing: boolean;

      scanning: boolean;
```

## 5. Performance & Cost Optimization

### 5.1 Performance Preferences

**Component:** `PerformancePreferences`

```typescript
interface PerformancePreferences {
  // Model preferences
  modelPreferences: {
    haiku: {
      name: "Claude Haiku";
      description: "R√°pido e econ√¥mico";
      responseTime: "<1 segundo";
      cost: "R$ 0.02 por requisi√ß√£o";
      useCase: "Consultas simples, reconhecimento b√°sico";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Claude Haiku: R√°pido e econ√¥mico. Menos de 1 segundo de resposta.";
      };
    };
    sonnet: {
      name: "Claude Sonnet";
      description: "Preciso e cultural";
      responseTime: "<2.5 segundos";
      cost: "R$ 0.10 por requisi√ß√£o";
      useCase: "Contexto cultural, express√µes regionais";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Claude Sonnet: Preciso e cultural. At√© 2,5 segundos de resposta.";
      };
    };
    opus: {
      name: "Claude Opus";
      description: "Avan√ßado e completo";
      responseTime: "<5 segundos";
      cost: "R$ 0.15 por requisi√ß√£o";
      useCase: "An√°lises complexas, casos especiais";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Claude Opus: Avan√ßado e completo. At√© 5 segundos de resposta.";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Cost management
  costManagement: {
    dailyBudget: number; // R$ 2.00 default
    monthlyBudget: number; // R$ 50.00 default
    alerts: {
      warning: number; // 80% of budget
      critical: number; // 100% of budget
    };
    optimization: {
      autoOptimization: boolean;
      modelSwitching: boolean;
      caching: boolean;
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Gerenciamento de custos. Or√ßamento di√°rio: R$ {budget}";
      alerts: {
        warning: "Aproximando limite do or√ßamento di√°rio";
        critical: "Or√ßamento di√°rio excedido. Usando modelo econ√¥mico.";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

### 5.2 Network Optimization

**Component:** `NetworkOptimization`

```typescript
interface NetworkOptimization {
  // Network detection
  networkDetection: {
    speed: "fast" | "medium" | "slow";
    type: "4G" | "5G" | "WiFi";
    region: "SP" | "RJ" | "NE" | "Sul";
    optimization: "automatic" | "manual";
  };
  
  // Regional optimization
  regionalOptimization: {
    SP: {
      networkSpeed: "fast";
      modelPreference: "sonnet";
      cacheStrategy: "aggressive";
      imageQuality: "high";
    };
    RJ: {
      networkSpeed: "medium";
      modelPreference: "balanced";
      cacheStrategy: "balanced";
      imageQuality: "medium";
    };
    NE: {
      networkSpeed: "slow";
      modelPreference: "haiku";
      cacheStrategy: "aggressive";
      imageQuality: "low";
    };
    Sul: {
      networkSpeed: "medium";
      modelPreference: "balanced";
      cacheStrategy: "balanced";
      imageQuality: "medium";
    };
  };
  
  // Peak hour optimization
  peakHourOptimization: {
    morning: {
      hour: "7:00-9:00";
      optimization: "haiku"; // Faster for commuters
      explanation: "Hor√°rio de pico matinal, otimizando para velocidade";
    };
    lunch: {
      hour: "12:00-14:00";
      optimization: "sonnet"; // Better for social activities
      explanation: "Hor√°rio de almo√ßo, contexto social importante";
    };
    evening: {
      hour: "18:00-20:00";
      optimization: "sonnet"; // Cultural context important
      explanation: "Hor√°rio de jantar, contexto cultural importante";
    };
    weekend: {
      hour: "19:00-22:00";
      optimization: "sonnet"; // Social context important
      explanation: "Fim de semana, contexto social importante";
    };
  };
  
  // Accessibility
  accessibility: {
    screenReader: "Otimiza√ß√£o de rede detectada. {region}, {speed}. Usando {model}.";
    networkAnnouncement: "Rede {speed} detectada. Otimizando para {region}.";
    peakHourAnnouncement: "Hor√°rio de pico detectado. Otimizando para {context}.";
  };
}
```

---

## 6. Final Setup & Confirmation

### 6.1 Setup Summary

**Component:** `SetupSummary`

```typescript
interface SetupSummary {
  // Configuration summary
  configuration: {
    region: "SP" | "RJ" | "NE" | "Sul";
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: boolean;
      voiceInput: boolean;
      highContrast: boolean;
      keyboardOnly: boolean;
    };
    performance: {
      modelPreference: "haiku" | "sonnet" | "opus" | "auto";
      costOptimization: boolean;
      networkOptimization: boolean;
    };
    payment: {
      pixConfigured: boolean;
      recipientName: string;
      pixKey: string;
    };
  };
  
  // Cultural patterns learned
  patternsLearned: {
    rodizio: boolean;
    happyHour: boolean;
    aniversario: boolean;
    churrasco: boolean;
    vaquinha: boolean;
  };
  
  // Accessibility features enabled
  accessibilityEnabled: {
    screenReader: boolean;
    voiceInput: boolean;
    keyboardNavigation: boolean;
    highContrast: boolean;
    voiceCommands: boolean;
  };
  
  // Summary interface
  summaryInterface: {
    type: "checklist" | "cards" | "list";
    sections: [
      "Regional Configuration",
      "Accessibility Setup",
      "Cultural Patterns",
      "Payment Integration",
      "Performance Optimization"
    ];
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Resumo da configura√ß√£o. {sections} configurados corretamente.";
      keyboardNavigation: "Tab to review sections, Enter to edit, Space to continue";
    };
  };
}
```

### 6.2 First Experience

**Component:** `FirstExperience`

```typescript
interface FirstExperience {
  // Welcome message
  welcomeMessage: {
    SP: "Rolou um rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? Agora voc√™ est√° pronto! üéâ";
    RJ: "Beleza, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? Agora voc√™ est√° pronto! üéâ";
    NE: "Oxe, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? Agora voc√™ est√° pronto! üéâ";
    Sul: "Bah, rod√≠zio? Happy hour? Anivers√°rio? Agora voc√™ est√° pronto! üéâ";
  };
  
  // First interaction suggestion
  firstInteraction: {
    suggestion: "Tente dizer: '{regionalExample}'";
    regionalExamples: {
      SP: "Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
      RJ: "Beleza, happy hour, 6 pessoas, R$ 240";
      NE: "Oxe, anivers√°rio meu, 8 pessoas, R$ 240";
      Sul: "Bah, churrasco fam√≠lia, 10 pessoas, R$ 300";
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Primeira experi√™ncia. Tente dizer: {example}";
      voiceActivation: "Diga 'Ei RachaAI' para ativar";
    };
  };
  
  // Help and support
  helpSupport: {
    tutorial: boolean;
    helpCenter: boolean;
    accessibility: boolean;
    regionalSupport: boolean;
    contact: {
      email: "suporte@rachaai.com.br";
      whatsapp: "+55 11 99999-9999";
      accessibility: "suporte.acessibilidade@rachaai.com.br";
    };
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Precisa de ajuda? Tutorial dispon√≠vel. Suporte de acessibilidade: {contact}";
      keyboardNavigation: "F1 for help, F2 for tutorial, F3 for accessibility support";
    };
  };
}
```

---

## 7. Success Criteria

### **Onboarding Success Metrics:**
- **Completion Rate:** 95%+ users complete onboarding
- **Regional Accuracy:** 100% correct region detection
- **Accessibility Setup:** 100% accessibility features configured
- **Cultural Understanding:** 90%+ users understand cultural patterns
- **Payment Setup:** 85%+ users configure PIX
- **Performance Optimization:** 90%+ users enable cost optimization

### **Onboarding Requirements:**
- **Brazilian cultural adaptation**
- **Regional language support**
- **Accessibility-first design**
- **Performance optimization**
- **Cost management education**
- **Payment integration setup**

The user onboarding flows ensure Brazilian users have a **smooth, culturally-aware, and accessible** introduction to RachaAI with **optimal performance** and **cost management** from the start.
